alert.note: Alert for Greer; Harmon; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:03PM CDT until August 12 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR JACKSON...SOUTH CENTRAL KIOWA...NORTHWESTERN TILLMAN...HARMON... SOUTHEASTERN GREER AND NORTHWESTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 403 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Hollis to 4 miles north of Olustee to near Headrick, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Altus, Hollis, Tipton, Blair, Olustee, Eldorado, Martha, Gould, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Altus Air Force Base, Tom Steed Reservoir, Duke, Warren, Humphreys, Hester, McQueen, McKnight, and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
